text: i
tap dancing like i love doing everything
that is related to arts
when i came here i wanted to put
together the special for arts and
business
and there are several things in music
right you have the harmony the rhythm
the melody improvisation
and the one thing that i liked it the
most was the rhythm
and it's unbelievable how many different
rhythms and and songs you can take out
of the tabs
and i think that's that's where my
passion came from
coming here you see so many people
particularly in arts starting new
venture artistics in music and dancing
because of that i chose in my elective
courses in the second year i chose the
courses that were related to
entertainment and to creative industries
i was in the marketing and consumer
products club
and i was responsible i was the chair of
the marketing conference last year
that was a great opportunity for me to
get together with all those hvac
students that love cpg industry
but it was a great way for me to connect
with
senior managers and to study a lot about
marketing trends
and challenges that the top marketing
professionals face today in the industry
it is an industry where you can be very
innovative if you want you just need to
work a lot on thinking out of the box
but it's i love the industry i think
it's just great to be very close to
consumers and what they want
what i'm planning short term is to
continue in maybe in the consumer
products industry but
not only with the focus on consumer
products i want to put together my
passion for entertainment
that comes to a very good timing today
because the big trend in consumer
products and in entertainment industry
is to work together in partnerships
but long term i would imagine myself
only focus on entertainment and trying
to help
talented artists that don't have
opportunities today to shine
and that's that's something that i
really want to help the world with
you
